summary: Adds four new swords to Skyrim, available to craft at the forge (steel category).
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/28858-1-1478748400.png[/img]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/28858-0-1478748400.png[/img]

[heading][color=#b0b6bc]CRAFTING[/color][/heading]
All can be tempered with one steel ingot and are categorized as steel at the forge.

BORDERWATCH:
steel ingot (2)
leather strips (1)

SQUIRE SWORD:
gold ingot (1)
steel ingot (2)
leather strips (1)

NULLMIR:
silver ingot (1)
steel ingot (2)
leather strips (1)

BLACK MAGIC:
ebony ingot (1)
steel ingot (2)
leather strips (1)


[heading][color=#b0b6bc]INSTALLATION[/color][/heading]
Download the main file and extract/un-zip/decompress it.
Move or copy everything in the mod's data folder to your Skyrim Data folder.
Activate the mod in the Skyrim launcher.
- or -
Use NMM


[heading][color=#b0b6bc]CREDITS[/color][/heading]
Nullmir - ImsumDave
[url=http://www.christianfletcher.com/Christian_Fletcher/Heroic_Line/Pages/Borderwatch.html]Borderwatch[/url] - Christian Fletcher
[url=http://sgainbrachta.deviantart.com/art/Curvilinear-hilt-1-263132882]Squire Sword[/url] - sgainbrachta on Deviantart
[url=http://www.wyvsner.com/images/bastard_sword_dd_black_magic.jpg]Black Magic[/url] - Unknown


[heading][color=#b0b6bc]PERMISSIONS[/color][/heading]
The assets included in this mod can be used for any non-commercial purpose (can't be included in something that costs money) so long as I am credited for the work used.
author: ImsumDave
